content: Bitcoin is one of the most popular coin in cryptocurrency, with this lots of people fall victim to those coin with bitcoin like promisesWhy do they are still taking advantages by this people and what are the reason? there is only one answer that i think most of us is sure, the promise of making high return in a short time, with people being in the situation of the pandemic that strike not only one nation but the whole world, this has become the most effective strategy for the scammers, imagine doubling or triple the money in the short period of time, since they are already on their last straw and want to get out in the current situation, they forget to think properly and this is how they were being take advantage, with social media and influencers, being paid by these people, they have become, popular without knowing their bad intentions, and the victim learn they had a mistake after they lost every thing.

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: In times of major financial crises, there are always people who are desperate and looking for a solution to get out of their financial problems.News about financial crypto scams has become almost daily in my country.The problem is that people are poorly informed about the crypto market and have false expectations that a lot of money can be made in crypto in a short time, based on some made-up stories on on line portals. On the other hand, it's very easy to get into crypto because you don't need the help or mediation of banks or brokers and that's why a lot of people try to make money from crypto.However, as with everything in life, if you don't know what you're doing, haven't properly informed yourself and analyzed the market, and rely on luck, most likely your crypto investment will end badly and you'll lose the money you invested.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: It's worth keeping in mind that Bitcoin has a large and established network effect, and it is the most widely accepted and valuable cryptocurrency. While it is possible that a newer cryptocurrency could surpass it in the future, it is unlikely to happen overnight, and significant adoption and technological advancement are required for that to happen. Some people may be looking for better cryptocurrencies than Bitcoin because they are motivated by the fear of missing out (FOMO) on potential gains in newer, more innovative coins; they believe newer coins are technologically superior and will eventually replace Bitcoin; they have skepticism or mistrust of Bitcoin due to its volatility or perceived lack of privacy; or they don't understand how powerful and unique Bitcoin actually is.

Bitcoin no matter how slow has been steady and have a proven track record, it has also shown interests in advancement of technology with its latest features and threads.
